alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pettis and east central Johnson Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whiteman Afb, or near Whiteman Air Force Base, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Knob Noster, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Houstonia, Whiteman Afb and Hughesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Missouri.
